title: Highly desirable Midtown Square unit in the most walkable area in Troy
posting_body: Highly desirable Midtown Square unit in the most walkable area in Troy with Birmingham Schools.
Walking distance to shopping, fitness, and restaurants.
unit has an open layout for living & dining areas and  The master bath boasts dual sink vanity, and a newly tiled shower in 2019.
Other upgrades include cherry cabinets, island and granite counter top, stainless steel appliances, slate tiled doorway.
Wood floor in most entry and upper level living area.
Natural gas fireplace offers the warm touch in the cold winter months and the balcony is the perfect spot for enjoying the cool summer breeze.
Two car garage in tandem and a heated mud-area on the ground level.
This unit is a must-see for those seeking hassle-free city life in the area.
